element_text:
{"chunk": "- the director has taken all the steps that ought to have been taken as a director in order to be aware of any relevant audit information
and to establish that the company's auditor is aware of that information.
AUDITORS
The auditors, Blick Rothenberg Audit LLP, will be proposed for re-appointment.
ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD:
Mr P R Gow - Director
22 November 2022
Page 5
REPORT OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITORS TO THE MEMBERS OF", "context": "This chunk is from the Report of the Directors section, which provides information about the directors' responsibilities and the re-appointment of the company's auditors."}
